channel.title: XCOINCH | Clearing House to facilitate the exchange of cryptocurrencies
channel.description: Recent content on XCOINCH | Clearing House to facilitate the exchange of cryptocurrencies

item.title: External Wallet
item.description: XCoinCH supports external wallets to sign transactions for exchanging cryptocurrencies cross chains.

item.title: TestNet Setting
item.description: Scatter(EOS-based wallet) and Metamask(Ethereum-based wallet) are applied on XCoinCH. Let’s see how to configure the settings.

item.title: Exchange Tokens Cross Chains
item.description: This tutorial explained how to use XCoinCH to exchange tokens cross chains.

item.title: Traditional Exchange
item.description: I think the readers who opened this article have got the same experiences to spend time with the traditional exchanges.

item.title: XCoinCH v1.0 Released
item.description: XCoinCH, a clearing house to facilitate the exchange token, cryptocurrencies cross chains is released XCoinCH, a clearing house to facilitate the exchange tokens, cryptocurrencies cross chains is released

item.title: Mark Sea
item.description: Mark Sea is the founder of Fintechee and XCoinCH.
